\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[d30df63db04438a2e2376454cc01be41]%mdk
$R \in \SO(3,\R)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={28}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c4ca4238a0b923820dcc509a6f75849b]%mdk
$1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={28}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[40ddba83c22acc2acaddff12c66d7adf]%mdk
$R.$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={28}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[3277b0686aa79ff72cb5409dc9878b14]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={30}
\det(R - I) = \det(R^T - I) = \det(R^{-1} - R^{-1}R) = \det(R^{-1}(I - R)) = \det(I - R).
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={35}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e1e1d3d40573127e9ee0480caf1283d6]%mdk
$R$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={35}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3e567ccf000ad69f19e78dcd951786be]%mdk
$\vu = (u_x, u_y, u_z)^T$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={35}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[2554a2bb846cffd697389e5dc8912759]%mdk
$\theta$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={35}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1d98412f68004ee8cdcba07da5a6f453]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={37}
R = \cos\theta \mqty[
1 & 0 & 0 \\
0 & 1 & 0 \\
0 & 0 & 1
]
+ (1 - \cos\theta) \mqty[
u_x^2 & u_x u_y & u_x u_z \\
u_x u_y & u_y^2 & u_x u_z \\
u_x u_z & u_x u_z & u_z^2
]
+ \sin\theta \mqty[
0 & -u_z & u_y \\
u_z & 0 & -u_x \\
-u_y & u_x & 0
]
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={53}
